Cyphosis = vertebral deformity in the sagittal plane. Aggravation of dorsal kyphosis (more rarely inversion of lordosis).

Most frequent cause = spinal growth dystrophy (Scheuermann's disease)

Painful

question.title: What is thoracic kyphosis in children?
question.description: A vertebral deformity in the sagittal plane. Aggravation of dorsal kyphosis (more rarely inversion of lordosis). Most frequent cause = spinal growth dystrophy (Scheuermann's disease) Painful
